pages.text: A $(thing)Plugin$() (or a multiplayer plug-in) is an additive file for a Minecraft multiplayer server. $(br2)$(thing)Plugins$() are often used to change certain aspects of the game, such as adding user rankings, or the addition of game modes, economy and more.
$(br)$(thing)Plugins$() do not change the game itself, as a $(thing)Mod$() does. $(br)$(li)You can find new plugins $(l:https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/bukkit-plugins)here$()
